page.title: 12Playground Game-Hot Rice
page.content: My best play ground game is Hot Rice. You play Hot Rice like this:- there are two people "it" and the two people who are "it" have got to do this- they have to get you below the knee with a ball. They are not allowed to move with the ball .They have to throw the ball to each other. All the class like to play Hot Rice and my friend is hard to get but we get him in the end. When you are caught you put a coloured band on then you have to get the others who are not caught.I am always caught .The last two that are not caught are "it" the next time we play Hot rice .
